title: Beginner 15 MINUTE Hill Walk | Treadmill Follow Along! #IBXRunning
description:
Let's grind up 7 Hill intervals. We are staying at the same speed the whole time but the incline will be testing you! Coach Veronica will talk you through this workout. Let's get at it!

15:00 minutes of Hill Walk Intervals

All speeds and inclines are suggestions. Please stay safe and within your comfort zone!

Join our community of runners: http://www.ibxrunning.com
Merch: https://www.ibxrunning.com/store
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ibxrunning/

00:00 - Intro
00:25 - Warm Up
03:25 - Workout!
13:25 - Cool Down

Songs Used:
1. Dancing Till We Get Lost - Frigga
2. I Know You Won't Let Me Down - Loving Caliber
3. Invested - Loving Caliber
4. Keep the Fire Burning - Ethan Martin
5. The Morning Light - L.M. Styles

What did you enjoy about this workout? What suggestions do you have? We would love to hear from you below 👇

SUBSCRIBE to our Channel for more workouts!► https://www.youtube.com/c/IBXRunning/featured

channelDescription:
We are a community that wants to improve ourselves through running. Whether that improvement comes in the form of bettering our health, becoming more disciplined, creating a more positive attitude, or simply decreasing our mile times, the IBX Running community is welcoming and constructive. IBX Running knows that runners come in all shapes, sizes, and skill levels, and endeavors to be a place where members of our community can feel comfortable to strive to be better than they were last week, last month, and last year.

Newsletter: https://ibx-running.beehiiv.com/subscribe
Website:  https://www.ibxrunning.com
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ibxrunning/

comments: This was a great quick workout

Hi!!! Just found this video several days ago. I bought a treadmill in September of this year. When I began I was 568 pounds. Currently I'm 516 and been at a plateau for a month now. When I first started I could barely walk a minute and that was at 1 mph. Currently I can walk six minutes and the max speed I can handle is 1.5 mph -1.9 mph. I have to hold on while I walk cuz I do have some balance issues. When you say start incline at 3 I start it at 1 then 1.5 by the six minute mark my heart rate is up and I'm sweating. I know the more I practice the better I'll get. I'm enjoying this workout. Thanks a million 💪😊
👍🏻felt great! Good for a quick workout.

Another great program with Veronica! Her form cues are spot on(whenever she says roll the shoulders back...yep..mine are hunched up & tense. Whenever she reminds us of our core...yep...my core is in lala land!). Thank you!!
This was great! Quick, efficient, and fun
